original_text: Because David did that which was right in the eyes of the Lord, and turned not aside from any thing that he commanded him all the days of his life, save only in the matter of Uriah the Hittite.
korean_text: 이는 다윗이 헷 사람 우리아의 일 외에는 평생에 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하고 자기에게 명령하신 모든 일을 어기지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Because David did that which was right
in the eyes of the Lord,
and turned not aside from any thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 어떤 것에서도 벗어나지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: all the days of his life,
save only in the matter of Uriah the Hittite.
